articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Netflix's Best New Show Has A Perfect 100% Critic Score - Forbes
articles.description: The best new show to hit Netflix in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone.
articles.content:
Supacell
Netflix
I am always on board for a new surprise hit on Netflix, as some of the highest profile projects often dont pan out how you wish they would. So my attention has definitely been grab… [+2172 chars]
